languages.text: "Давно не видел вас на мостике, проктор. Были заняты чем-то важным?"
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne is in 2nd phase (his remorse over lying to the RT). The RT demoted Solomorne to a deck cleaner.

traits.locale_text: "Давно не видел вас на мостике, проктор. Были заняты чем-то важным?"

languages.text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne is in 2nd phase (his remorse over lying to the RT). The RT demoted Solomorne to a deck cleaner.
languages.original_text: "Давно не видел вас на мостике, проктор. Были заняты чем-то важным?"

"I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

"I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

languages.text: 「最近ブリッジでお見かけしませんね、代理人殿。何か重要な任務でお忙しかったのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: 「最近ブリッジでお見かけしませんね、代理人殿。何か重要な任務でお忙しかったのですか？」

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch in letzter Zeit nicht auf der Brücke gesehen, Proktor. Wart Ihr mit wichtigen Aufgaben beschäftigt?"
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch in letzter Zeit nicht auf der Brücke gesehen, Proktor. Wart Ihr mit wichtigen Aufgaben beschäftigt?"

languages.text: « Il est devenu si rare de vous voir sur la passerelle, proctor. Auriez-vous quelque tâche cruciale qui occupe tout votre temps ? »
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: « Il est devenu si rare de vous voir sur la passerelle, proctor. Auriez-vous quelque tâche cruciale qui occupe tout votre temps ? »

languages.text: «Últimamente no le veo por el puente, Procurador. ¿Tiene alguna tarea importante entre manos?».
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: «Últimamente no le veo por el puente, Procurador. ¿Tiene alguna tarea importante entre manos?».

languages.text: “我最近没怎么在舰桥上见过你，监察官。你是不是在负责某些重要的任务？”
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: “我最近没怎么在舰桥上见过你，监察官。你是不是在负责某些重要的任务？”

languages.text: "Ne zamandır köprüde görünmüyorsun Üsteğmen. Başka işlere mi gömüldün yoksa?"
languages.original_text: "I have not seen you around the bridge lately, Proctor. Were you preoccupied with some crucial tasks?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne zamandır köprüde görünmüyorsun Üsteğmen. Başka işlere mi gömüldün yoksa?"
